Title: Father of the Bride (1)
Plot: Following his escape, Nate Haskell, the notorious 'Dick & Jane' killer, resurfaces when he e-mails a disturbing video to the father of one of his brides, threatening to take her life.
GuestStars: Bruce Davison, Louise Lombard, Tracee Ellis Ross, Kate Blumberg, Amanda Wyss, Raymond J. Barry, Roxanne Hart, Tawny Kitaen, Terry Bozeman, Archie Kao, Larry Sullivan, Jon Wellner, Dean Norris, Bill Irwin
